tools.name: Webpack

tools.name: Vite
tools.description: A fast build tool and development server powered by native ES modules

tools.name: Gulp
tools.description: A toolkit to automate & enhance your workflow

tools.name: Grunt
tools.description: A JavaScript task runner for automation of repetitive tasks

tools.name: Rollup
tools.description: A module bundler for JavaScript that compiles small pieces of code into something larger and more complex

tools.name: Snowpack
tools.description: A lightning-fast frontend build tool, now deprecated in favor of Vite

tools.name: Turbopack
tools.description: An incremental bundler optimized for JavaScript and TypeScript, written in Rust

tools.name: esbuild
tools.description: An extremely fast JavaScript bundler and minifier written in Go

tools.name: SWC
tools.description: A super-fast TypeScript/JavaScript compiler written in Rust

tools.name: Rome
tools.description: A unified toolchain for JavaScript, TypeScript, JSON, HTML, Markdown, and CSS

tools.name: Bun
tools.description: An all-in-one JavaScript runtime & toolkit designed for speed, complete with a bundler, test runner, and package manager

tools.name: WMR
tools.description: A tiny, fast web development tool for modern web apps

tools.name: tsup
tools.description: The simplest and fastest way to bundle your TypeScript libraries

tools.name: Rspack
